what: Add market share columns to a scenario dataset — add_market_share_columns
title: Add market share columns to a scenario dataset — add_market_share_columns
text: Calculates adds market share values (ie. technology market-share ratio sector market-share percentage) scenario dataset. reference start-year must provided.

title: Add market share columns to a scenario dataset — add_market_share_columns
Add market share columns to a scenario dataset — add_market_share_columns
text: data scenario dataset, like FIXME: Define exported demo scenario. reference_year baseline year, technology- sector- market shares calculated. Note: start year, tmsr = 1 smsp =0 respectively.

title: Prepare GECO 2022 scenario data — prepare_geco_2022_scenario
text: Prepare GECO 2022 scenario data

title: Prepare GECO 2022 scenario data — prepare_geco_2022_scenario
code: prepare_geco_2022_scenario(   geco_2022_automotive_raw,   geco_2022_aviation_raw,   geco_2022_fossil_fuels_15c_raw,   geco_2022_fossil_fuels_ndc_raw,   geco_2022_fossil_fuels_ref_raw,   geco_2022_power_15c_raw,   geco_2022_power_ndc_raw,   geco_2022_power_ref_raw,   geco_2022_steel_raw )

title: Prepare GECO 2022 scenario data — prepare_geco_2022_scenario
text: geco_2022_automotive_raw raw GECO 2022 automotive scenario data-frame. geco_2022_aviation_raw raw GECO 2022 aviation scenario data-frame. geco_2022_fossil_fuels_15c_raw raw GECO 2022 fossil fuels 1.5C scenario data-frame. geco_2022_fossil_fuels_ndc_raw raw GECO 2022 fossil fuels NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2022_fossil_fuels_ref_raw raw GECO 2022 fossil fuels reference scenario data-frame. geco_2022_power_15c_raw raw GECO 2022 power 1.5C scenario data-frame. geco_2022_power_ndc_raw raw GECO 2022 power NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2022_power_ref_raw raw GECO 2022 power reference scenario data-frame. geco_2022_steel_raw raw GECO 2022 steel scenario data-frame.

title: Prepare GECO 2022 scenario data — prepare_geco_2022_scenario
text: prepared GECO 2022 scenario data-frame.

title: Prepare GECO 2023 scenario data — prepare_geco_2023_scenario
text: geco_2023_aviation_15c_raw raw GECO 2023 automotive 1.5 scenario data-frame. geco_2023_aviation_ndc_raw raw GECO 2023 automotive NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2023_aviation_ref_raw raw GECO 2023 automotive Reference scenario data-frame. geco_2023_fossil_fuels_15c_raw raw GECO 2023 fossil fuels 1.5 scenario data-frame. geco_2023_fossil_fuels_ndc_raw raw GECO 2023 fossil fuels NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2023_fossil_fuels_ref_raw raw GECO 2023 fossil fuels Reference scenario data-frame. geco_2023_power_cap_15c_raw raw GECO 2023 power capacity 1.5 scenario data-frame. geco_2023_power_cap_ndc_raw raw GECO 2023 power capacity NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2023_power_cap_ref_raw raw GECO 2023 power capacity Reference scenario data-frame. geco_2023_steel_15c_raw raw GECO 2023 steel 1.5 scenario data-frame. geco_2023_steel_ndc_raw raw GECO 2023 steel NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2023_steel_ref_raw raw GECO 2023 steel Reference scenario data-frame. geco_2023_supplement_15c_raw raw GECO 2023 supplemental 1.5 scenario data-frame. geco_2023_supplement_ndc_raw raw GECO 2023 supplemental NDC scenario data-frame. geco_2023_supplement_ref_raw raw GECO 2023 supplemental Reference scenario data-frame.

title: Prepare GECO 2023 scenario data — prepare_geco_2023_scenario
